description.value:
Master Crafted Relic Tome of the Genesis Chapter. Consulting this tome prior to a mission grants +20 to all Common Lore (War), Scholastic Lore (Codex Astartes), and Tactis (any) Tests for the duration of the Mission. If consulted in reference to a specific situation, provides +30 instead and adds a degree of success to any successful tests.

Effect: Hero

Notes: 35 R
description.summary: Master Crafted Relic Tome of the Genesis Chapter. Consulting this tome prior to a mission grants +20 to all Common Lore (War), Scholastic Lore (Codex Astartes), and Tactis (any) Tests for the duration
